products.title: Cloud-Based Accounting & Inventory Software | EOXS
products.overview: Cloud-based accounting, invoicing & inventory management software for your business. Create invoices, track expenses, get a real-time view of your inventory and view financial reports when and where you need them.

main_features.name: Manage Sales and Orders
details: Manage your sales and orders from start to finish. Create estimates and convert to invoice upon confirmation. Receive and record online payments automatically. Fulfill orders and keep track of your cost of goods sold.

main_features.name: Take Charge of Your Inventory
details: Manage all your inventory through a single dashboard. Whether you're picking, packing, and shipping, or even drop shipping, we've got you covered!

main_features.name: Quick and Easy Setup
details: Your team can just sign up for unique accounts EOXS Books using your email or social authentication and half the work is done. Get preconfigured accounting rules, invoice templates, tax codes, charts of accounts among other things. Jump in and start creating invoices and run your business. Easily import your excel files or simply connect EOXS to your existing database for automatic import.

main_features.name: Create and Send Invoices
details: Generate and send invoices from your phone or laptop in minutes. Convert your confirmed quotations and estimates to invoices in one click. Use your interface with EOXS to get paid immediately.

main_features.name: Professional Invoice Templates
details: Get ready to use professional and prodigious looking templates for all transactions like invoices, quotations, orders, bills and payment receipts. You can also simply build your own template and upload and use your template to print or email PDFs to your contacts.

main_features.name: Track Bills & Purchases
details: Record purchase orders and bills in a few clicks. Keep track of your payables and expenses in one place. Email purchase orders to your suppliers and receive goods on time to maintain optimal inventory levels.

main_features.name: Easily Track Dropship Orders
details: EOXS Books allows you to rapidly create dropship orders for your supplier from customer orders. All the product, quantity and delivery address fields will be auto populated. All you need to do is update the fulfillment status once the actual shipment is done - EOXS takes care of all the accounting nits and grits.

main_features.name: Better Backorder Management
details: Get notified of any shortfall in inventory while creating estimates/quotations or invoices. Create a backorder immediately in one click and get notified when you have received the goods. Fulfill all your orders on time and never fall short on inventory.

main_features.name: All Your Contacts in One Place
details: Maintain your supplier and customer list in one centralized location. Access contact details from anywhere, anytime. Track unsettled receivables and payables easily and keep your cash flow strong.

main_features.name: Automate Inventory Tracking Across Warehouses
details: Track different types of products, including goods, services, raw materials and finished goods. Inventory movement across multiple warehouses is recorded automatically when you carry out any transaction. Get the flexibility of auto fulfillment and auto goods receipt when creating invoices and bills.

main_features.name: Pick Pack Ship
details: Get premium inventory functions like pick freight in EOXS Books. Conduct your entire sales and order fulfillment online. Create picking lists, pack into cartons and boxes, and ship via a carrier of your choice. Print packing and shipping labels. Track the order shipment in real time.

main_features.name: Configurable Chart of Accounts
details: EOXS Books comes with a preconfigured Chart of Accounts suitable for your business. All the necessary mappings are done for you so you don't have to spend any time in GL configuration. You can always choose to add/edit or import your own chart of accounts via a simple excel upload.

main_features.name: Easy Adjustment of Invoices & Bills
details: Easily adjust your invoices and bills when needed with credit and debit notes. Create credit and debit notes when necessary for your customers and suppliers. Apply credit and debit notes against invoices and bills in one click to knock off outstanding amounts. All the accounting entries are made automatically so you can focus on your business.

main_features.name: Record Upfront Payments
details: Record loan payments and deposits for your suppliers and customers in the currency of your choice. Use the advances to knock off against existing or future bills and invoices.

main_features.name: Automatic Tax Calculations
details: Record purchase orders and bills in a few clicks. Keep track of your payables and expenses in one place. Email purchase orders to your suppliers and receive goods on time to maintain optimal inventory stock.

main_features.name: Add Your Own Fields
details: Configure your data entry fields by adding custom fields of your choice to multiple forms like invoices, bills, journal entries, contacts or products. Filter all reports, including financial reports by custom fields to get better insight into your data.

main_features.name: Real Time Reports
details: Access all reports, including financial reports online. View income statement, balance sheet, trial balance, cash flow statement, general ledger and tax reports on your phone or desktop. Get detailed insight into your sales, purchase and inventory. Splice your reports using custom fields.

main_features.name: Add Your Accountants for Free
details: Simply enter your accountant's email and invite them to use the system. Control the access rights for team members with our simple yet powerful department based access system.

main_features.name: Auto Journal Entries
details: All transactional journal entries, like an invoice or forex gain/loss are automatically created and mapped to the correct general ledger account for proper reporting.

products.title: Making Steel Sexy Again
products.overview: Rajat Jain, an Indian-born entrepreneur turned steel‑tech founder, aims to spark a conversation about revitalising the U.S. steel distribution ecosystem through technology, inclusion, and sustainability.

main_features.name: Key Takeaways
details: Innovation debt from outdated processes erodes margins faster than tech upgrades cost.
Combining digital transformation with diverse teams yields competitive advantage.
Smart, visible supply chains mitigate import and logistics shocks.
Cloud ERP provides the single source of truth for e‑commerce and analytics.
Early adoption of green steel practices captures premium markets.

main_features.name: Chapters
details: For the Sake of History: A historical overview of steel over 4,000 years, highlighting U.S. dominance post‑Bessemer and warning against complacency.
If It Ain’t Broken, Don’t Fix It: Critiques the maintenance‑mode mindset in distributors, drawing parallels with Nokia, Kodak, and Blockbuster.
Steel Industry Needs to Embrace Technology: COVID‑19 exposed the sector’s tech lag; modernisation is urgent to combat manual processes and talent shortages.
The Fourth Industrial Revolution (Industry 4.0): Explains AI, IoT, and cloud levers for predictive maintenance, inventory optimisation, and smart factories.
Steel Strong: Overcoming Supply‑Chain Challenges: Addresses imports, raw‑material volatility, and logistics bottlenecks; prescribes digital roadmaps and capacity expansion.
ERP Is the Need of the Hour: Cloud ERP integrates operations, eliminating spreadsheet chaos and unlocking real‑time analytics despite adoption hurdles.
B2B E‑commerce is the Future: Digital storefronts automate quoting and expand reach, contingent on cybersecurity and staff up‑skilling.
Break the Doors: Overcoming Gate‑keeping: Highlights exclusionary hiring; diversity boosts creativity, tech adoption, and customer alignment.
Build a Steel Industry for a Sustainable Future: Outlines pathways to low‑carbon steel via energy efficiency, recycling, renewables, and CCS.
